long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Basket Swooshes is an exciting basketball game available as a Chrome Extension. You can play this game for free on the website https://basketballlegends.net/. In "Basket Swooshes," you will test your shooting skills and aim to score as many baskets as possible within a limited time. With its addictive gameplay and challenging levels, this game will keep you engaged and entertained. Use your mouse to aim and shoot the ball, and try to achieve the highest score by making consecutive baskets. Whether you're a basketball enthusiast or simply looking for a fun time, "Basket Swooshes" offers a thrilling basketball experience right at your fingertips. So, grab your virtual basketball and get ready to swish those shots like a pro!

*Note: We have added "Unblocked Games" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website https://basketballlegends.net/
